title: Felix (band)
text:
Felix were a British <a href="chamber%20pop">chamber pop</a> musical group, whose members included Lucinda Chua, Chris Summerlin and Elv Beetham. In 2009, Felix signed to Chicago-based label <a href="Kranky%20%28record%20label%29">Kranky</a>, following support from <a href="Ambient%20Music">Ambient Music</a> band <a href="Stars%20of%20the%20Lid">Stars of the Lid</a>. Their debut album met positive feedback from <a href="BBC%20Music">BBC Music</a> and "<a href="Pitchfork%20%28website%29">Pitchfork</a>".
Chua has played with <a href="A%20Winged%20Victory%20for%20the%20Sullen">A Winged Victory for the Sullen</a> and, in 2017, was working on a solo album produced by <a href="Adam%20Wiltzie">Adam Wiltzie</a> from the band.
